description.narrative: The management of the Country Programme by UNIEF and its partners is undertaken through effective and adaptive planning based on reliable up-to-date and regularly available data, allowing a correct assessment of performance, bottlenecks and results.

sector.narrative: Country programme process (including UNDAF planning and CCA)

title.narrative: Madagascar United Nations Development Assistance Framework
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
2018 Madagascar: Impact Evaluation of Fiavota Phase 1 Emergency and Recovery Cash Transfer in Madagascar
Madagascar 2019 Annual Report on Results for Children
Madagascar Country Office 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: The management of the Country Programme by UNIEF and its partners is undertaken through effective and adaptive planning based on reliable up-to-date and regularly available data, allowing a correct assessment of performance, bottlenecks and results.

description.narrative: 2019 was an important year for strategic planning for UNICEF Madagascar, in addition to routine planning and monitoring activities. UNICEF undertook a Country Programme Evaluation, Situation Analysis, RBM training, Strategic Moment of Reflection, and began development of Programme Strategy Notes, involving partners and regional colleagues. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: % of AWPs with a semi-annual milestone at Output or Activity levels
Number of annual updates of the Resource Mobilisation Strategy
# of Annual Reviews of the consolidated CO Results Framework conducted, ensuring consistency with framework documents (CPD/CPAP) and containing SMART indicators and results.
% of programme sections with an updated AWP signed by qualified national authorities
% of Output indicators updated annually in RAM 2.0 and presented at the annual programme review
% of recommendations of the Mid-Term Review integrated in the updated strategic planning documents
% of Outcome indicators updated at the Mid-Term Review
